00063 /**
00064    ## FUNCTION:
00065         int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00066   
00067    ## SPECIFICATION:
00068         Main program!
00069   
00070 */
00071 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00072 {
00073         fprintf(stdout, "***** POCKET HUNTING BEGINS ***** \n") ;
00074 
00075         s_fparams *params = get_fpocket_args(argc, argv) ;
00076         
00077         /* If parameters parsing is ok */
00078         if(params) {
00079                 if(params->pdb_lst != NULL) {
00080                 /* Handle a list of pdb */
00081                         int i ;
00082             for (i = 0 ; i < params->npdb ; i++) {
00083                                 
00084                                 printf("> Protein %d / %d : %s", i, params->npdb,
00085                                                                                                    params->pdb_lst[i]) ;
00086                                 if(i == params->npdb - 1) fprintf(stdout, "\n") ;
00087                                 else fprintf(stdout, "\r") ;
00088                                 fflush(stdout) ;
00089                 process_pdb(params->pdb_lst[i], params) ;
00090             }
00091                 }
00092                 else {
00093                         if(params->pdb_path == NULL || strlen(params->pdb_path) <= 0) {
00094                                 fprintf(stdout, "! Invalid pdb name given.\n");
00095                                 print_pocket_usage(stdout) ;
00096                         }
00097                         else {
00098                                 process_pdb(params->pdb_path, params) ;
00099                         }
00100                 }
00101         
00102                 free_fparams(params) ;
00103         }
00104         else {
00105                 print_pocket_usage(stdout) ;
00106         }
00107 
00108         fprintf(stdout, "***** POCKET HUNTING ENDS ***** \n") ;
00109         free_all() ;
00110 
00111         return 0;
00112 }
00113 /**
00114    ## FUNCTION: 
00115         process_pdb
00116   
00117    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00118         Handle a single pdb: check the pdb name, load data, and launch fpocket if
00119         the pdb file have been successfully read.
00120   
00121    ## PARAMETRES:
00122         @ char *pdbname     : Name of the pdb
00123         @ s_fparams *params : Parameters of the algorithm. See fparams.c/.h
00124   
00125    ## RETURN: 
00126         void
00127   
00128 */
00129 void process_pdb(char *pdbname, s_fparams *params) 
00130 {
00131         /* Check the PDB file */
00132         if(pdbname == NULL) return ;
00133         
00134         int len = strlen(pdbname) ;
00135         if(len >= M_MAX_PDB_NAME_LEN || len <= 0) {
00136                 fprintf(stderr, "! Invalid length for the pdb file name. (Max: %d, Min 1)\n",
00137                                 M_MAX_PDB_NAME_LEN) ;
00138                 return ;
00139         }
00140         
00141         /* Try to open it */
00142         s_pdb *pdb =  rpdb_open(pdbname, NULL, M_DONT_KEEP_LIG) ;
00143         
00144         if(pdb) {
00145                 /* Actual reading of pdb data and then calculation */
00146                         rpdb_read(pdb, NULL, M_DONT_KEEP_LIG) ;
00147                         c_lst_pockets *pockets = search_pocket(pdb, params);
00148                         if(pockets) {
00149                                 write_out_fpocket(pockets, pdb, pdbname);
00150                                 c_lst_pocket_free(pockets) ;
00151                         }
00152         }
00153         else fprintf(stderr, "! PDB reading failed!\n");
00154 }
